Package com.game.myGame

Class Enemy

java.lang.Object
com.game.myGame.Sprite
com.game.myGame.Enemy
Direct Known Subclasses:
GhostShip, Krampus
public class Enemy
extends Sprite
Class that represent the enemy. It has some special features so it extends the Sprite class
Author:
MatteoValerio

  • Constructor Details

    • Enemy

      public Enemy​(int posX, int posY, java.lang.String name, ImageLoader imgL, int xMax, int level)
      Public constructor. It builds the enemy sprite. It also adjust the position for this particular sprite
      Parameters:
      posX - The new x pos
      posY - The new y pos
      name - The name of the sprite
      imgL - The image loader
      level - The level that called him

  • Method Details

    • hit

      public int hit​(int damage)
      Gets hit. Return the remaining life. Damage can't be a number <0
      Parameters:
      damage - Damage to be inflicted
      Returns:
      The remaining life after being hit

    • fire
